name: Coin Catcher (Clara Lopez)
description:
My very first project, done at Artfx in 2019

Made on Unreal Engine 4
For Windows (64-Bit)
Gameplay time: 25 seconds (if you pass all the obstacles in one)

Controls:
Left and Right movement:
-Directional Arrow
-'Q' and 'D'
-Left Stick: Left and Right

Others:
Pause
-Escape
-Click
-Left Stick: Up and Down
-Start button
-Action Button (ex: A for Xbox Gamepad)

PS: I use a lot of elements from the "StarterContent" of UE4.
The purple thing is in reality a table turn into a mortal obstacle hehe.
